page.title: 18NOTTINGHAM - ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: COLWICK RACE COURSE The Race Course is on the edge of Sneinton near West Lake and below Colwick Woods and over the other end is a little adventure park where children can play.Races usually take place on Monday and Tuesday evenings.The Race Course is one and a half miles all the way around the inside of the track.The horses have to run round the track and see who wins.Some people bet who is going to win for money.There is a stand at the top of the track where spectators sit and watch the race.The jockeys get changed in a changing room.When we went down to the Race Course with our Geography class a man showed us round.We looked in all the stables and saw some horses.There were birds nesting in the roof of the stables.
